summary: The Bandage Stays On - Donald Trump stands confidently with a huge, bandage on his ear, looking fazed and slightly amused. Our President Trump stands strong with his bandage. A sign of his strength and perseverance after his assassination attempt. This legendary bandage is a symbol of freedom and hope for all. It will forever be an iconic symbol in our society. And it is already becoming a cultural phenomenon as his supporters surround him, a crowd of diverse people—young and old, men and women—each with their own makeshift ear bandages, stand in solidarity, fighting for freedom!
